VineWhip.name: Vine Whip
VineWhip.describtion: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

RazorLeaf.name: Razor Leaf
RazorLeaf.describtion: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing team.

LeafTornado.name: Leaf Tornado
LeafTornado.describtion: The user attacks its target by encircling it in sharp leaves.

BulletSeed.name: Bullet Seed
BulletSeed.describtion: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target. Two to five seeds are shot in rapid succession.

SeedBomb.name: Seed Bomb
SeedBomb.describtion: The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above.

SolarBeam.name: Solar Beam
SolarBeam.describtion: The creature gathers sun power and creates a devastating beam

MagicalLeaf.name: Magical Leaf
MagicalLeaf.describtion: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the target.

GrassPledge.name: Grass Pledge
GrassPledge.describtion: A column of grass hits opposing creature.

LeafStorm.name: Leaf Storm
LeafStorm.describtion: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target.
